snippet: Fighters with the extremist group Boko Haram took back control of the border town of Marte in northeastern Nigeria on Friday.
abstract: Boko Haram retakes northeastern town of Marte, Nigeria, weeks after Nigerian military claimed to have contained threat of Islamic militants.
lead_paragraph: Fighters with the extremist group Boko Haram took back control of the border town of Marte in northeastern Nigeria on Friday.
